00199 void HandleLoadOfMapBottomGraphics( void )
00200 {
00201       // will load the graphics needed for the mapscreen interface bottom
00202       VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc; 
00203 
00204       // will create buttons for interface bottom 
00205       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00206 
00207       if (iResolution == 0)
00208       {
00209             FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00210       }
00211       else if (iResolution == 1)
00212       {
00213             FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom_800x600.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00214       }
00215       else if (iResolution == 2)
00216       {
00217             FilenameForBPP( "INTERFACE\\map_screen_bottom_1024x768.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile );
00218       }
00219 
00220       if( !AddVideoObject( &VObjectDesc, &guiMAPBOTTOMPANEL ) )
00221             return;
00222 
00223 
00224       // load slider bar icon
00225       LoadMessageSliderBar( );
00226 
00227       return;
00228 }
00229 
00230 BOOLEAN LoadMapScreenInterfaceBottom( void )
00231 {
00232       CreateButtonsForMapScreenInterfaceBottom( );
00233       CreateMapScreenBottomMessageScrollBarRegion( );
00234 
00235       // create pause region
00236       CreateCompressModePause( );
00237       
00238       return( TRUE );
00239 }

00248       return;
00249 }

00260 
00261       return;
00262 }

00264 
00265 void RenderMapScreenInterfaceBottom( void )
00266 {
00267       // will render the map screen bottom interface
00268       HVOBJECT hHandle;
00269       CHAR8 bFilename[ 32 ];
00270       
00271       // WANNE 2
00272       fDisplayOverheadMap = FALSE;
00273 
00274 
00275       // WANNE 2 <redraw>
00276       // render whole panel
00277       if( fMapScreenBottomDirty == TRUE )
00278       {
00279             // get and blt panel
00280         GetVideoObject(&hHandle, guiMAPBOTTOMPANEL ); 
00281         BltVideoObject( guiSAVEBUFFER , hHandle, 0, MAP_BOTTOM_X, MAP_BOTTOM_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL );
00282 
00283             if( GetSectorFlagStatus( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ, SF_ALREADY_VISITED ) == TRUE )
00284             {
00285                   GetMapFileName( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ, bFilename, TRUE, TRUE ); 
00286                   LoadRadarScreenBitmap( bFilename );
00287             }
00288             else
00289             {
00290                   ClearOutRadarMapImage();
00291             }
00292 
00293             fInterfacePanelDirty = DIRTYLEVEL2;
00294 
00295             // display title
00296             DisplayCurrentBalanceTitleForMapBottom( );
00297 
00298             // dirty buttons
00299             MarkButtonsDirty( );
00300 
00301             // WANNE 2
00302             // invalidate region
00303             RestoreExternBackgroundRect( MAP_BOTTOM_X, MAP_BOTTOM_Y, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT - MAP_BOTTOM_Y );
00304 
00305             // re render radar map
00306             RenderRadarScreen( );
00307 
00308             // reset dirty flag
00309             fMapScreenBottomDirty = FALSE;
00310             fMapBottomDirtied = TRUE;
00311       }
00312 
00313       DisplayCompressMode( );
00314 
00315       DisplayCurrentBalanceForMapBottom( );
00316       DisplayProjectedDailyMineIncome( );
00317 
00318       // draw the name of the loaded sector
00319       DrawNameOfLoadedSector( );
00320       
00321       // display slider on the scroll bar
00322       DisplayScrollBarSlider( );
00323 
00324       // display messages that can be scrolled through
00325       DisplayStringsInMapScreenMessageList( );
00326       
00327       // handle auto scroll
00328       //CheckForAndHandleAutoMessageScroll( );
00329 
00330       EnableDisableMessageScrollButtonsAndRegions( );
00331 
00332       EnableDisableBottomButtonsAndRegions( );
00333 
00334       fMapBottomDirtied = FALSE;
00335       return;
00336 }

00411 void DestroyButtonsForMapScreenInterfaceBottom( void )
00412 {
00413       // will destroy the buttons for the mapscreen bottom interface
00414 
00415       RemoveButton( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ 0 ] );
00416       RemoveButton( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ 1 ] );
00417       RemoveButton( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ 2 ] );
00418       RemoveButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ 0 ] );
00419       RemoveButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ 1 ] );
00420       RemoveButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ 0 ] );
00421       RemoveButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ 1 ] ); 
00422 
00423 
00424       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBottomExitButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00425       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBottomExitButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00426       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBottomExitButtonsImage[ 2 ] );
00427       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapMessageScrollButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00428       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapMessageScrollButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00429       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBottomTimeButtonsImage[ 0 ] );
00430       UnloadButtonImage( guiMapBottomTimeButtonsImage[ 1 ] );
00431 
00432       // reset dirty flag
00433       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00434       
00435       return;
00436 }

00439 void BtnLaptopCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
00440 {
00441       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00442       {
00443             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00444             {
00445                   // stop mapscreen text
00446                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00447             }
00448 
00449             // redraw region
00450             if( btn->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00451             {
00452                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00453             }
00454 
00455         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00456       }
00457       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00458   {
00459             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00460             {
00461                   // stop mapscreen text
00462                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00463             }
00464 
00465     if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00466             {
00467                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON | BUTTON_DIRTY);
00468                   DrawButton( btn->IDNum );
00469 
00470                   RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP );
00471         }
00472       }     
00473       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00474       {
00475             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00476             {
00477                   // stop mapscreen text
00478                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00479             }
00480       }
00481 }

00484 void BtnTacticalCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
00485 {
00486       
00487       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00488       {
00489             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00490             {
00491                   // stop mapscreen text
00492                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00493                   return;
00494             }
00495 
00496             // redraw region
00497             if( btn->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00498             {
00499                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00500             }
00501 
00502         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00503       }
00504       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00505   {
00506    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00507             {
00508                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00509 
00510                   RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL );
00511         }
00512       }
00513       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00514       {
00515             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00516             {
00517                   // stop mapscreen text
00518                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00519                   return;
00520             }
00521       }
00522 }

00524 void BtnOptionsFromMapScreenCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn, INT32 reason )
00525 {
00526 
00527       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00528       {
00529 
00530             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00531             {
00532                   // stop mapscreen text
00533                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00534                   return;
00535             }
00536 
00537             // redraw region
00538             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00539             {
00540                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00541             }
00542 
00543         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00544       }
00545       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00546   {
00547    if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00548             {
00549                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00550                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00551 
00552                   RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( MAP_EXIT_TO_OPTIONS );
00553         }
00554       }
00555       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00556       {
00557             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00558             {
00559                   // stop mapscreen text
00560                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00561                   return;
00562             }
00563       }
00564 }

00566 void DrawNameOfLoadedSector( void )
00567 {
00568       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
00569   INT16 sFontX, sFontY;
00570 
00571 
00572   SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00573 
00574       SetFont( COMPFONT );
00575       SetFontForeground( 183 );
00576       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00577       
00578 
00579       GetSectorIDString( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( INT8 )( iCurrentMapSectorZ ),sString, TRUE );
00580       ReduceStringLength( sString, 80, COMPFONT );
00581 
00582       // WANNE 2
00583       //VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( 548, 426, 80, 16, COMPFONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, sString );
00584       VarFindFontCenterCoordinates( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 92), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 55), 80, 16, COMPFONT, &sFontX, &sFontY, sString );
00585       mprintf( sFontX, sFontY, L"%s", sString );
00586 }

00589 void CompressModeClickCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
00590 {
00591       if( iReason & ( MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP | MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP ) )
00592   {
00593             if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == TRUE )
00594                   return;
00595 
00596             RequestToggleTimeCompression();
00597       }
00598 }

00601 void BtnTimeCompressMoreMapScreenCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
00602 {
00603 
00604       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00605       {
00606             if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == TRUE )
00607                   return;
00608 
00609             // redraw region
00610             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00611             {
00612                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00613             }
00614 
00615         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00616       }
00617       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00618   {
00619             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00620             {
00621                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00622                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00623 
00624                   RequestIncreaseInTimeCompression();
00625         }
00626       }
00627       else  if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00628       {
00629             if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == TRUE )
00630                   return;
00631       }
00632 }
00633 
00634 
00635 
00636 void BtnTimeCompressLessMapScreenCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
00637 {
00638 
00639   if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00640       {
00641             if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == TRUE )
00642                   return;
00643 
00644             // redraw region
00645             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00646             {
00647                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00648             }
00649 
00650         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00651       }
00652       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00653   {
00654             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00655             {
00656       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00657                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00658 
00659                   RequestDecreaseInTimeCompression();
00660         }
00661       }     
00662       else  if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00663       {
00664             if ( CommonTimeCompressionChecks() == TRUE )
00665                   return;
00666       }
00667 }

00670 
00671 void BtnMessageDownMapScreenCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
00672 {
00673       static INT32 iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00674 
00675       if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00676       {
00677             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00678             {
00679                   // stop mapscreen text
00680                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00681                   return;
00682             }
00683 
00684             // redraw region
00685             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00686             {
00687                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00688             }
00689 
00690         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00691 
00692         iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00693       }
00694       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00695   {
00696             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00697             {
00698       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00699 
00700                   // redraw region
00701                   if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00702                   {
00703                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00704                   }
00705 
00706                   // down a line
00707                   MapScreenMsgScrollDown( 1 );
00708         }
00709       }     
00710       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
00711       {     
00712             if( GetJA2Clock() - iLastRepeatScrollTime >= MESSAGE_BTN_SCROLL_TIME )
00713             {
00714                   // down a line
00715                   MapScreenMsgScrollDown( 1 );
00716 
00717               iLastRepeatScrollTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00718             }
00719       }
00720       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00721       {
00722             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00723             {
00724                   // stop mapscreen text
00725                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00726                   return;
00727             }
00728 
00729             // redraw region
00730             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00731             {
00732                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00733             }
00734 
00735         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00736 
00737         iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00738       }
00739       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00740   {
00741             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00742             {
00743       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00744 
00745                   // redraw region
00746                   if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00747                   {
00748                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00749                   }
00750 
00751                   // down a page
00752                   MapScreenMsgScrollDown( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
00753         }
00754       }
00755       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_REPEAT )
00756       {     
00757             if( GetJA2Clock() - iLastRepeatScrollTime >= MESSAGE_BTN_SCROLL_TIME )
00758             {
00759                   // down a page
00760                   MapScreenMsgScrollDown( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
00761 
00762               iLastRepeatScrollTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00763             }
00764       }
00765 }

00767 
00768 void BtnMessageUpMapScreenCallback( GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason )
00769 {
00770       static INT32 iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00771 
00772 
00773       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
00774       {
00775             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00776             {
00777                   // stop mapscreen text
00778                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00779                   return;
00780             }
00781 
00782         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON); 
00783 
00784        // redraw region
00785             if( btn->Area.uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00786             {
00787                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00788             }
00789 
00790         iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00791       }
00792 
00793       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
00794   {
00795             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00796             {
00797                   btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00798 
00799                   // redraw region
00800                   if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00801                   {
00802                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00803                   }
00804              
00805                   // up a line
00806                   MapScreenMsgScrollUp( 1 );
00807         }
00808       }
00809       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT )
00810       {     
00811             if( GetJA2Clock() - iLastRepeatScrollTime >= MESSAGE_BTN_SCROLL_TIME )
00812             {
00813                   // up a line
00814                   MapScreenMsgScrollUp( 1 );
00815 
00816               iLastRepeatScrollTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00817             }
00818       }
00819       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_DWN )
00820       {
00821             if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
00822             {
00823                   // stop mapscreen text
00824                   StopMapScreenHelpText( );
00825                   return;
00826             }
00827 
00828             // redraw region
00829             if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00830             {
00831                   fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00832             }
00833 
00834         btn->uiFlags|=(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);   
00835 
00836         iLastRepeatScrollTime = 0;
00837       }
00838       else if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP )
00839   {
00840             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
00841             {
00842       btn->uiFlags&=~(BUTTON_CLICKED_ON);
00843 
00844                   // redraw region
00845                   if( btn ->uiFlags & MSYS_HAS_BACKRECT )
00846                   {
00847                         fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00848                   }
00849 
00850                   // up a page
00851                   MapScreenMsgScrollUp( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
00852         }
00853       }
00854       else if( reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_REPEAT )
00855       {
00856             if( GetJA2Clock() - iLastRepeatScrollTime >= MESSAGE_BTN_SCROLL_TIME )
00857             {
00858                   // up a page
00859                   MapScreenMsgScrollUp( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
00860 
00861               iLastRepeatScrollTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00862             }
00863       }
00864 }

00866 
00867 
00868 void EnableDisableMessageScrollButtonsAndRegions( void )
00869 {
00870       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
00871 
00872   ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
00873 
00874       // if no scrolling required, or already showing the topmost message
00875       if( ( ubNumMessages <= MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM ) || ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex == 0 ) )
00876       {
00877             DisableButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_UP ] );
00878             ButtonList[ guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_UP ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00879       }
00880       else
00881       {
00882             EnableButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_UP ] );
00883       }
00884 
00885       // if no scrolling required, or already showing the last message
00886       if( ( ubNumMessages <= MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM ) ||
00887                   ( ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex + MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM ) >= ubNumMessages ) )
00888       {
00889             DisableButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_DOWN ] );
00890             ButtonList[ guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_DOWN ] ]->uiFlags &= ~( BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
00891       }
00892       else
00893       {
00894             EnableButton( guiMapMessageScrollButtons[ MAP_SCROLL_MESSAGE_DOWN ] );
00895       }
00896 
00897       if( ubNumMessages <= MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM )
00898       {
00899             MSYS_DisableRegion( &gMapMessageScrollBarRegion );
00900       }
00901       else
00902       {
00903             MSYS_EnableRegion( &gMapMessageScrollBarRegion );
00904       }
00905 }
00906 
00907 
00908 void DisplayCompressMode( void )
00909 {
00910       INT16 sX, sY;
00911       CHAR16 sString[ 128 ];
00912       static UINT8 usColor = FONT_LTGREEN;
00913 
00914       // get compress speed
00915       if( giTimeCompressMode != NOT_USING_TIME_COMPRESSION )
00916       {
00917             if( IsTimeBeingCompressed() )
00918             {
00919                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", sTimeStrings[ giTimeCompressMode ] );
00920             }
00921             else
00922             {
00923                   swprintf( sString, L"%s", sTimeStrings[ 0 ] );
00924             }
00925       }
00926 
00927       //RestoreExternBackgroundRect( 489, 456, 522 - 489, 467 - 454 );
00928       // WANNE 2
00929       RestoreExternBackgroundRect( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 151), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 24), 63, 13 );
00930 
00931       SetFontDestBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, 0,0,SCREEN_WIDTH,SCREEN_HEIGHT, FALSE );
00932       SetFont( COMPFONT );
00933       
00934       if( GetJA2Clock() - guiCompressionStringBaseTime >= PAUSE_GAME_TIMER )
00935       {
00936             if( usColor == FONT_LTGREEN )
00937             {
00938                   usColor = FONT_WHITE;
00939             }
00940             else
00941             {
00942                   usColor = FONT_LTGREEN;
00943             }
00944 
00945             guiCompressionStringBaseTime = GetJA2Clock();
00946       }
00947 
00948       if( ( giTimeCompressMode != 0 ) && ( GamePaused( ) == FALSE ) )
00949       {
00950             usColor = FONT_LTGREEN;
00951       }
00952 
00953       SetFontForeground( usColor );
00954       SetFontBackground( FONT_BLACK );
00955   
00956       // WANNE 2
00957       //FindFontCenterCoordinates( 489, 456, 522 - 489, 467 - 454, sString, COMPFONT, &sX, &sY );
00958       FindFontCenterCoordinates( (SCREEN_WIDTH - 151), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 24), 33, 13, sString, COMPFONT, &sX, &sY );
00959       mprintf( sX, sY, sString );
00960   
00961 
00962       return;
00963 }
00964

00969                                           MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, CompressModeClickCallback );*/
00970 
00971       // WANNE 2
00972       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMapPauseRegion, (SCREEN_WIDTH - 153), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 24), (SCREEN_WIDTH - 118), (SCREEN_HEIGHT - 13), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00973                                           MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, CompressModeClickCallback );

01002 void CreateMapScreenBottomMessageScrollBarRegion( void )
01003 {
01004             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gMapMessageScrollBarRegion, MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_START_X, MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_START_Y,
01005                                                 MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_END_X, MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_END_Y,
01006                                                 MSYS_PRIORITY_NORMAL, MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, MapScreenMessageScrollBarCallBack ); 
01007 }

01010 void DeleteMapScreenBottomMessageScrollRegion( void )

01013 }
01014 
01015 
01016 
01017 void MapScreenMessageScrollBarCallBack( MOUSE_REGION *pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01018 {
01019       POINT MousePos;
01020       UINT8 ubMouseYOffset;
01021       UINT8 ubDesiredSliderOffset;
01022       UINT8 ubDesiredMessageIndex;
01023       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
01024 
01025 
01026   if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01027   {
01028         return;
01029   }
01030 
01031 
01032       if ( iReason & ( MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN | MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_REPEAT ) )
01033   {
01034             // how many messages are there?
01035         ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
01036 
01037             // region is supposed to be disabled if there aren't enough messages to scroll.  Formulas assume this
01038             if ( ubNumMessages > MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM )
01039             {
01040                   // where is the mouse?
01041                   GetCursorPos( &MousePos );
01042 
01043                   ubMouseYOffset = (UINT8) MousePos.y - MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_START_Y;
01044 
01045                   // if clicking in the top 5 pixels of the slider bar
01046                   if ( ubMouseYOffset < ( SLIDER_HEIGHT / 2 ) )
01047                   {
01048                         // scroll all the way to the top
01049                         ubDesiredMessageIndex = 0;
01050                   }
01051                   // if clicking in the bottom 6 pixels of the slider bar
01052                   else if ( ubMouseYOffset >= ( MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_HEIGHT - ( SLIDER_HEIGHT / 2 ) ) )
01053                   {
01054                         // scroll all the way to the bottom
01055                         ubDesiredMessageIndex = ubNumMessages - MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM;
01056                   }
01057                   else
01058                   {
01059                         // somewhere in between
01060                         ubDesiredSliderOffset = ubMouseYOffset - ( SLIDER_HEIGHT / 2 );
01061 
01062                         Assert( ubDesiredSliderOffset <= SLIDER_BAR_RANGE );
01063 
01064                         // calculate what the index should be to place the slider at this offset (round fractions of .5+ up)
01065                         ubDesiredMessageIndex = ( ( ubDesiredSliderOffset * ( ubNumMessages - MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM ) ) + ( SLIDER_BAR_RANGE / 2 ) ) / SLIDER_BAR_RANGE;
01066                   }
01067 
01068                   // if it's a change
01069                   if ( ubDesiredMessageIndex != gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex )
01070                   {
01071                         ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( ubDesiredMessageIndex );
01072                   }
01073             }
01074       }
01075 }
01076 
01077 
01078 void DisplayScrollBarSlider( )
01079 {
01080       // will display the scroll bar icon
01081       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
01082       UINT8 ubSliderOffset;
01083       HVOBJECT hHandle;
01084 
01085 
01086   ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
01087 
01088       // only show the slider if there are more messages than will fit on screen
01089       if ( ubNumMessages > MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM )
01090       {
01091             // calculate where slider should be positioned
01092             ubSliderOffset = ( SLIDER_BAR_RANGE * gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex ) / ( ubNumMessages - MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
01093 
01094             GetVideoObject( &hHandle, guiSliderBar );
01095             BltVideoObject( FRAME_BUFFER, hHandle, 8, MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_START_X + 2, MESSAGE_SCROLL_AREA_START_Y + ubSliderOffset, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, NULL );
01096       }
01097 }

01167 
01168 void EnableDisableBottomButtonsAndRegions( void )
01169 {
01170       INT8 iExitButtonIndex;
01171 
01172       // this enables and disables the buttons MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP, MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL, and MAP_EXIT_TO_OPTIONS
01173       for ( iExitButtonIndex = 0; iExitButtonIndex < 3; iExitButtonIndex++ )
01174       {
01175             if ( AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( iExitButtonIndex ) )
01176             {
01177                   EnableButton( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ iExitButtonIndex ]);
01178             }
01179             else                    
01180             {
01181                   DisableButton( guiMapBottomExitButtons[ iExitButtonIndex ]);
01182             }
01183       }
01184 
01185       // enable/disable time compress buttons and region masks
01186       EnableDisableTimeCompressButtons( );
01187       CreateDestroyMouseRegionMasksForTimeCompressionButtons( );
01188 
01189 
01190       // Enable/Disable map inventory panel buttons
01191 
01192       // if in merc inventory panel
01193       if( fShowInventoryFlag )
01194       {
01195             // and an item is in the cursor
01196             if( ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) || ( InKeyRingPopup( ) == TRUE ) || InItemStackPopup() )
01197             {
01198                   DisableButton( giMapInvDoneButton );
01199             }
01200             else                    
01201             {
01202                   EnableButton( giMapInvDoneButton );
01203             }
01204 
01205             if( fShowDescriptionFlag )
01206             {
01207                   ForceButtonUnDirty( giMapInvDoneButton );
01208             }
01209       }
01210 }
01211 
01212 
01213 void EnableDisableTimeCompressButtons( void )
01214 {
01215       if( AllowedToTimeCompress( ) == FALSE )
01216       {
01217             DisableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_MORE ] );
01218             DisableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_LESS ] );
01219       }
01220       else
01221       {
01222             // disable LESS if time compression is at minimum or OFF
01223             if ( !IsTimeCompressionOn() || giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X0 )
01224             {
01225                   DisableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_LESS ] );
01226             }
01227             else
01228             {
01229                   EnableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_LESS] );
01230             }
01231 
01232             // disable MORE if we're not paused and time compression is at maximum
01233             // only disable MORE if we're not paused and time compression is at maximum
01234             if ( IsTimeCompressionOn() && ( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_60MINS ) )
01235             {
01236                   DisableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_MORE ] );
01237             }
01238             else
01239             {
01240                   EnableButton( guiMapBottomTimeButtons[ MAP_TIME_COMPRESS_MORE ] );
01241             }
01242       }
01243 }

01257 
01258 
01259 BOOLEAN AllowedToTimeCompress( void )
01260 {
01261       // if already leaving, disallow any other attempts to exit
01262       if ( fLeavingMapScreen )
01263       {
01264             return( FALSE );
01265       }
01266 
01267       // if already going someplace
01268       if ( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere != -1 )
01269       {
01270             return( FALSE );
01271       }
01272 
01273       // if we're locked into paused time compression by some event that enforces that
01274       if ( PauseStateLocked() )
01275       {
01276             return( FALSE );
01277       }
01278 
01279       // meanwhile coming up
01280       if ( gfMeanwhileTryingToStart )
01281       {
01282             return( FALSE );
01283       }
01284 
01285       // someone has something to say
01286       if ( !DialogueQueueIsEmpty() )
01287       {
01288             return( FALSE );
01289       }
01290 
01291       // moving / confirming movement
01292       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || fPlotForHelicopter || gfInConfirmMapMoveMode || fShowMapScreenMovementList )
01293       {
01294             return( FALSE );
01295       }
01296 
01297       if( fShowAssignmentMenu || fShowTrainingMenu || fShowAttributeMenu || fShowSquadMenu || fShowContractMenu || fShowRemoveMenu )
01298       {
01299             return( FALSE );
01300       }
01301 
01302       if( fShowUpdateBox || fShowTownInfo || ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 ) )
01303       {
01304             return( FALSE );
01305       }
01306 
01307       // renewing contracts
01308       if ( gfContractRenewalSquenceOn )
01309       {
01310             return( FALSE );
01311       }
01312 
01313       // disabled due to battle?
01314       if( ( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle ) || ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster ) )
01315       {
01316             return( FALSE );
01317       }
01318 
01319       // if holding an inventory item
01320       if ( fMapInventoryItem )
01321       {
01322             return( FALSE );
01323       }
01324 
01325       // show the inventory pool?
01326       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01327       {
01328             // prevent time compress (items get stolen over time, etc.)
01329             return( FALSE );
01330       }
01331 
01332       // no mercs have ever been hired
01333       if( gfAtLeastOneMercWasHired == FALSE )
01334       {
01335             return( FALSE );
01336       }
01337 
01338 /*
01339       //in air raid
01340       if( InAirRaid( ) == TRUE )
01341       {
01342             return( FALSE );
01343       }
01344 */
01345 
01346       // no usable mercs on team!
01347       if ( !AnyUsableRealMercenariesOnTeam() )
01348       {
01349             return( FALSE );
01350       }
01351 
01352             // must wait till bombs go off
01353       if ( ActiveTimedBombExists() )
01354       {
01355             return( FALSE );
01356       }
01357       
01358       // hostile sector / in battle
01359       if( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) || ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector ) )
01360       {
01361             return( FALSE );
01362       }
01363 
01364       if( PlayerGroupIsInACreatureInfestedMine() )
01365       {
01366             return FALSE;
01367       }
01368 
01369       return( TRUE );
01370 }

01555 BOOLEAN CommonTimeCompressionChecks( void )
01556 {
01557       if( IsMapScreenHelpTextUp() )
01558       {
01559             // stop mapscreen text
01560             StopMapScreenHelpText( );
01561             return( TRUE );
01562       }
01563 
01564       if( ( bSelectedDestChar != -1 ) || ( fPlotForHelicopter == TRUE ) )
01565       {
01566             // abort plotting movement
01567             AbortMovementPlottingMode( );
01568             return( TRUE );
01569       }
01570 
01571 //    if ( gfInAirRaid )
01572 //          return TRUE;
01573 
01574       return( FALSE );
01575 }

01578 
01579 BOOLEAN AnyUsableRealMercenariesOnTeam( void )
01580 {
01581       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
01582       INT32 iCounter = 0, iNumberOnTeam = 0;
01583 
01584 
01585       // this is for speed, this runs once/frame
01586       iNumberOnTeam = gTacticalStatus.Team[ OUR_TEAM ].bLastID;
01587 
01588       // get number of mercs on team who are not vehicles or robot, POWs or EPCs
01589       for( iCounter = 0; iCounter < iNumberOnTeam; iCounter++ )
01590       {
01591             pSoldier = &Menptr[ iCounter ];
01592 
01593             if( ( pSoldier->bActive ) && ( pSoldier->bLife > 0 ) &&
01594                         !( pSoldier->uiStatusFlags & SOLDIER_VEHICLE ) && !AM_A_ROBOT( pSoldier ) &&
01595                         ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_POW ) &&
01596                         ( pSoldier->bAssignment != ASSIGNMENT_DEAD ) &&
01597                         ( pSoldier->ubWhatKindOfMercAmI != MERC_TYPE__EPC ) )
01598             {
01599                   return( TRUE );
01600             }
01601       }
01602 
01603       return( FALSE );
01604 }

01606 
01607 void RequestTriggerExitFromMapscreen( INT8 bExitToWhere )
01608 {
01609       Assert( ( bExitToWhere >= MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP ) && ( bExitToWhere <= MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE ) );
01610 
01611       // if allowed to do so
01612       if ( AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( bExitToWhere ) )
01613       {
01614             //if the screen to exit to is the SAVE screen
01615             if( bExitToWhere == MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE )
01616             {
01617                   //if the game CAN NOT be saved
01618                   if( !CanGameBeSaved() )
01619                   {
01620                         //Display a message saying the player cant save now
01621                         DoMapMessageBox( MSG_BOX_BASIC_STYLE, (INT16 *)zNewTacticalMessages[ TCTL_MSG__IRON_MAN_CANT_SAVE_NOW ], MAP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
01622                         return;
01623                   }
01624             }
01625 
01626             // permit it, and get the ball rolling
01627             gbExitingMapScreenToWhere = bExitToWhere;
01628 
01629             // delay until mapscreen has had a chance to render at least one full frame
01630             gfOneFramePauseOnExit = TRUE;
01631       }
01632 }
01633 
01634 
01635 BOOLEAN AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( INT8 bExitToWhere )
01636 {
01637       Assert( ( bExitToWhere >= MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP ) && ( bExitToWhere <= MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE ) );
01638 
01639       // if already leaving, disallow any other attempts to exit
01640       if ( fLeavingMapScreen )
01641       {
01642             return( FALSE );
01643       }
01644 
01645       // if already going someplace else
01646       if ( ( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere != -1 ) && ( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere != bExitToWhere ) )
01647       {
01648             return( FALSE );
01649       }
01650 
01651       // someone has something to say
01652       if ( !DialogueQueueIsEmpty() )
01653       {
01654             return( FALSE );
01655       }
01656 
01657       // meanwhile coming up
01658       if ( gfMeanwhileTryingToStart )
01659       {
01660             return( FALSE );
01661       }
01662 
01663       // if we're locked into paused time compression by some event that enforces that
01664       if ( PauseStateLocked() )
01665       {
01666             return( FALSE );
01667       }
01668 
01669       // if holding an inventory item
01670       if ( fMapInventoryItem || ( gMPanelRegion.Cursor == EXTERN_CURSOR ) )
01671       {
01672             return( FALSE );
01673       }
01674 
01675       if( fShowUpdateBox || fShowTownInfo || ( sSelectedMilitiaTown != 0 ) )
01676       {
01677             return( FALSE );
01678       }
01679 
01680       // renewing contracts
01681       if( gfContractRenewalSquenceOn )
01682       {
01683             return( FALSE );
01684       }
01685 
01686       // battle about to occur?
01687       if( ( fDisableDueToBattleRoster ) || ( fDisableMapInterfaceDueToBattle ) )
01688       {
01689             return( FALSE );
01690       }
01691 
01692 /*
01693       // air raid starting
01694       if( gubAirRaidMode == AIR_RAID_START )
01695       {
01696             // nope
01697             return( FALSE );
01698       }
01699 */
01700 
01701 
01702       // the following tests apply to going tactical screen only
01703       if ( bExitToWhere == MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL )
01704       {
01705             // if in battle or air raid, the ONLY sector we can go tactical in is the one that's loaded
01706             if ( ( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) || ( gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector ) /*|| InAirRaid( )*/ ) &&
01707                          ( ( sSelMapX != gWorldSectorX ) || ( sSelMapY != gWorldSectorY ) || ( ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) != gbWorldSectorZ ) )
01708             {
01709                   return( FALSE );
01710             }
01711 
01712             // must have some mercs there
01713             if( !CanGoToTacticalInSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ ) )
01714             {
01715                   return( FALSE );
01716             }
01717       }
01718 
01719       //if we are map screen sector inventory
01720       if( fShowMapInventoryPool )
01721       {
01722             //dont allow it
01723             return( FALSE );
01724       }
01725 
01726       // OK to go there, passed all the checks
01727       return( TRUE );
01728 }
01729 
01730 
01731 void HandleExitsFromMapScreen( void )
01732 {
01733       // if going somewhere
01734       if ( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere != -1 )
01735       {
01736             // delay all exits by one frame...
01737             if( gfOneFramePauseOnExit == TRUE )
01738             {
01739                   gfOneFramePauseOnExit = FALSE;
01740                   return;
01741             }
01742 
01743             // make sure it's still legal to do this!
01744             if ( AllowedToExitFromMapscreenTo( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere ) )
01745             {
01746                   // see where we're trying to go
01747                   switch ( gbExitingMapScreenToWhere )
01748                   {
01749                         case MAP_EXIT_TO_LAPTOP:
01750                               fLapTop = TRUE;
01751                               SetPendingNewScreen(LAPTOP_SCREEN);
01752 
01753                               if( gfExtraBuffer )
01754                               { //Then initiate the transition animation from the mapscreen to laptop...
01755                                     
01756                                     // WANNE 2
01757                                     BlitBufferToBuffer( FRAME_BUFFER, guiEXTRABUFFER, 0, 0, SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT );
01758                                     gfStartMapScreenToLaptopTransition = TRUE;
01759                               }
01760                               break;
01761 
01762                         case MAP_EXIT_TO_TACTICAL:
01763                               SetCurrentWorldSector( sSelMapX, sSelMapY, ( UINT8 )iCurrentMapSectorZ );
01764                               break;
01765 
01766                         case MAP_EXIT_TO_OPTIONS:
01767                               guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
01768                               SetPendingNewScreen( OPTIONS_SCREEN );
01769                               break;
01770 
01771                         case MAP_EXIT_TO_SAVE:
01772                         case MAP_EXIT_TO_LOAD:
01773                               gfCameDirectlyFromGame = TRUE;
01774                               guiPreviousOptionScreen = guiCurrentScreen;
01775                               SetPendingNewScreen( SAVE_LOAD_SCREEN );
01776                               break;
01777 
01778                         default:
01779                               // invalid exit type
01780                               Assert( FALSE );
01781                   }
01782 
01783                   // time compression during mapscreen exit doesn't seem to cause any problems, but turn it off as early as we can
01784                   StopTimeCompression();
01785 
01786                   // now leaving mapscreen
01787                   fLeavingMapScreen = TRUE;
01788             }
01789 
01790             // cancel exit, either we're on our way, or we're not allowed to go
01791             gbExitingMapScreenToWhere = -1;
01792       }
01793 }
01794

01796 
01797 void MapScreenMsgScrollDown( UINT8 ubLinesDown )
01798 {
01799       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
01800 
01801   ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
01802 
01803       // check if we can go that far, only go as far as we can
01804       if ( ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex + MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM + ubLinesDown ) > ubNumMessages )
01805       {
01806             ubLinesDown = ubNumMessages - gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex - min( ubNumMessages, MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
01807       }
01808 
01809       if ( ubLinesDown > 0 )
01810       {
01811             ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( ( UINT8 ) ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex + ubLinesDown ) );
01812       }
01813 }
01814 
01815 
01816 void MapScreenMsgScrollUp( UINT8 ubLinesUp )
01817 {
01818       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
01819 
01820   ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
01821 
01822       // check if we can go that far, only go as far as we can
01823       if ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex < ubLinesUp )
01824       {
01825             ubLinesUp = gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex;
01826       }
01827 
01828       if ( ubLinesUp > 0 )
01829       {
01830             ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( ( UINT8 ) ( gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex - ubLinesUp ) );
01831       }
01832 }
01833

01835 
01836 void MoveToEndOfMapScreenMessageList( void )
01837 {
01838       UINT8 ubDesiredMessageIndex;
01839       UINT8 ubNumMessages;
01840 
01841   ubNumMessages = GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages();
01842 
01843       ubDesiredMessageIndex = ubNumMessages - min( ubNumMessages, MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM );
01844       ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( ubDesiredMessageIndex );
01845 }

01848 
01849 void ChangeCurrentMapscreenMessageIndex( UINT8 ubNewMessageIndex )
01850 {
01851       Assert( ubNewMessageIndex + MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM <= max( MAX_MESSAGES_ON_MAP_BOTTOM, GetRangeOfMapScreenMessages() ) );
01852 
01853       gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex = ubNewMessageIndex;
01854       gubCurrentMapMessageString = ( gubStartOfMapScreenMessageList + gubFirstMapscreenMessageIndex ) % 256;
01855 
01856       // set fact we just went to a new message
01857 //    gfNewScrollMessage = TRUE;
01858 
01859       // refresh screen
01860       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01861 }
